scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of figures gathered together, with the Virgin Mary in the center, her hands clasped in prayer. To her left and right are bearded men, also looking upwards. Above them, a dove descends, radiating golden light, symbolizing the Holy Spirit. Other figures, possibly apostles or saints, are visible in the upper portion of the image, their faces turned towards the divine presence. The overall impression is one of spiritual devotion and divine inspiration.
